author: Helen Cook
comment: Great idea especially as Uber seems in no hurry to make their app Android wear compatible. However, this crashes with every button I press. Running on a Moto 360 2015.

reply.author: Konrad Iturbe - Chernowii
reply.content:
Hi, can you elaborate more on the crash? Try just tapping on the location icon, and the send button. Make sure to watch the video embedded in the app's Play store page. Respond to me by email, which you can find in the app's description.

EDIT: Just fixed the bug on a Android Wear emulator for round watch, thanks for the report!

title: Great idea but...
